resources.string: The goal of Simon Sound is to mimic Simon\'s pattern based on the sound. Follow Simon\'s pattern and click each individual button to recreate Simon\'s pattern.

The goal of Simon Self is to remember as much of your own custom pattern as possible. Start by choosing a button to start the sequence. Then repeat that sequence, adding more to your pattern as the rounds progress.

The goal of Simon Stochastic is to follow Simon\'s patterns. Each round introduces a random pattern to confuse the player. After each round, the pattern grows, so the player must remember more complex patterns as the game progresses.
